Title.evidence: Title: Randomised Controlled Trial of Inhaled Nitric Oxide in Cardiac Surgery

Trial_Design.evidence: This systematic review and meta-analysis included randomised controlled trials (RCTs)

Intervention.evidence: RCTs comparing inhaled NO with placebo or standard care

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was the incidence of acute kidney injury (AKI).

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation and allocation concealment methods were not specified.

Number_Randomised.evidence: Ten RCTs involving 838 patients were included.

Result_Outcome.evidence: NO administration reduced AKI incidence (RR: 0.78; 95% CI: 0.64â€“0.94; p = 0.010)
